# makeXPCConnection()

**Instance Method**

Initiates an XPC connection to the app extension’s scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func makeXPCConnection() throws -> NSXPCConnection
```

## Discussion

Call this method from the [doc://com.apple.extensionkit/documentation/ExtensionKit/EXHostViewControllerDelegate/hostViewControllerDidActivate(_:)] method to initiate a scene-specific connection to the app extension.
